description: A rate shaping class restricts the number of connections being processed by a virtual server at once.

max_rate_per_minute.description: Requests that are associated with this rate class will be rate-shaped to this many requests per minute, set to "0" to disable the limit.

max_rate_per_second.description: Although requests will be rate-shaped to the "max_rate_per_minute", the traffic manager will also rate limit per-second. This smooths traffic so that a full minute's traffic will not be serviced in the first second of the minute, set this to "0" to disable the per-second limit.

note.description: A description of the rate class.

title: Rate Shaping Class
